column4: hi, i've installed ubuntu 10.10 and my nvidia driver has stoped working, i get a blank screen on start, how can i solve it?
how did you install the driver?
i've installed ubuntu 10.04, everything was working fine, then i upgraded to 10.10, it stopped working, i had recommended drivers
hmm... no idea on that one... sorry... sounds like the upgrade didn't go as well as planned though
